text: Aur agar tumhein is amr mein shakk hai ke yeh kitab jo humne apne bandey par utari hai, yeh hamari hai ya nahin, to iske manind (similar) ek hi surat bana lao, apne saarey humnawa ko bula lo (associates to assist you), ek Allah ko chodh kar baki jis jis ki chaho madad lelo agar tum sacchey ho to yeh kaam karke dikhao
